content.question: Which of the following explanations is best supported by the data shown in the map above?

choices.label: Earth’s climate has changed over geological time, and plates on Earth’s crust have shifted.
Sea level rise has led to an increased concentration of wildlife inland as the coastal areas flood.
Organisms adapt to human population growth by changing at the genetic level.
Animals migrate seasonally to mate and to find food in different habitats.

content.answer: Animals migrate seasonally to mate and to find food in different habitats.

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Describe patterns or trends in data.
